name: My MetaTrader
description: My MetaTrader (mTrader) is a decentralized exchange (DEX) built on the Arbitrum One Layer-2 blockchain. MyMetaTrader aims to revolutionize the future of trading. As a decentralized platform, My MetaTrader is governed by the community, with proposals and funding allocated through a transparent and democratic process. This allows for continuous innovation and the development of new products and features, such as virtual reality trading and AI-powered trading bots. With a wide range of leverages and pairs, My MetaTrader offers traders up to 150x on crypto, 1000x on forex and commodities, 100x on stocks, 35x on indices, and 10x on NFT floor prices.
